alert.note: Alert for Talladega (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 03 at 2:02PM CST until January 03 at 2:30PM CST by NWS Birmingham
info.description: The National Weather Service in Birmingham has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Talladega County in east central Alabama... * Until 230 PM CST. * At 201 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Oak Grove, or over Sylacauga, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Sylacauga, Oak Grove, Sycamore, Sylacauga Municipal Airport, Gantts Quarry and Mignon. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CST for east central Alabama. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
